page.syntax: C a5_arguments_SQLList(C connectionName ,C tablename ,C filter ,C displayValue_or_Expn [,C returnValue_or_Expn [,N maxValues ]])
page.description: Used to define a dynamic list of choices from a SQL data source when defining arguments. If MaxValues = 0 then all values are returned. 'Tablename' can optionally be a SQL SELECT statement.
